comments.body:
It doesn't solve the spacing/padding problem, now we have this (one space at 9 columns before the end, i.e after the right-padding of the name and before the left-padding of the time):

```
before ------------------------------------------------------------------ 0.00s
after----------------------------------------------------------------- --- 0.00s
```
